views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11,12 and 13,  for iPhone X/Fluidy/FluidEnabler/LittleX.

Easier access to your ControlCenter on iPhone X.

You can swipe up from the bottom-left/bottom-right of the screen to call the ControlCenter.

More features can be added.

Configure options from Settings.

Added support for iOS 13. Added screenshot shortcut.
Added support landscape mode. Add an option to enable low sensibility mode.
Add a slider to change the width of center area.
Fixed gestures override problems.
Fixed crashes in settings pages.
Fixed settings didn't show up properly.
More smooth.
Now users can customize the gestures of SpringBoard/LockScreen/Third-Party-Apps.


Make it easier to control the iPhone X.

Now more gestures options were added, please go to settings and reset your gestures preferences.
